channel.title: Stupid question but it needs an answer!
channel.description: ok I want to make a downloadable version for my rsps but idk how to do that please help

item.title: Stupid question but it needs an answer!
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:13, topic:425538”][quote author=rhys132 link=topic=528200.msg3851673#msg3851673 date=1324074301]

To make it downloadable just get winrar make it a rar on your desktop, get on www.uppit.com, upload the rar, and give the link out to the internet

its ment to be .ZIP not .RAR

if you have TV ill help you make a webclient, the trouble with a client is that some peoples computers arent compatible with the java, they dont know how to change this and so confusion sets in, a webclient is the best bet.

Are you telling me because i can zip it? And it can be zip or rar…

that in my opinion made no sense, im saying that you have to Zip the files inside your cache folder.
[/quote]
Sry i was trying to say this, he not trying to upload his cache… he wants a downloadable version for his server. So he should just rar it then they can download his client then they can extract. He didn’t say anything about a cache?[/quote]
ah misread i apologiyse

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid question but it needs an answer!

To make it downloadable just get winrar make it a rar on your desktop, get on www.uppit.com, upload the rar, and give the link out to the internet

its ment to be .ZIP not .RAR

if you have TV ill help you make a webclient, the trouble with a client is that some peoples computers arent compatible with the java, they dont know how to change this and so confusion sets in, a webclient is the best bet.

Are you telling me because i can zip it? And it can be zip or rar…
[/quote]
that in my opinion made no sense, im saying that you have to Zip the files inside your cache folder.[/quote]
Sry i was trying to say this, he not trying to upload his cache… he wants a downloadable version for his server. So he should just rar it then they can download his client then they can extract. He didn’t say anything about a cache?
